newsitem.title: POLAND: Swarzedz share issue to start week later.
newsitem.headline: Swarzedz share issue to start week later.

text.p: Polish furniture maker Swarzedz SA has delayed the start of its 6.6-million-share issue to October 2 from September 25, the company said in a statement on Wednesday.
Swarzedz is offering 1.75 million shares in a one-for-two rights on October 2 and October 3.
The subscription for 1.3 million shares in a closed tranche for large investors will take place from October 6 to October 8 and for 450,000 shares in an open tranche from October 9 to 14.
The subscription for 3.1 million shares offered to creditors in a debt-for-equity swap will take place on October 15 and October 16.
The price range has been set at 8.16 to 11 zlotys.
